lines.text: We can't be bastards since we are champions of France.
O.K., listen, young man... , you aren't going to answer "Why?" to all I say, are you?
At your age and with the name you bear, Madam, dirty words can only be... quotations.
Never under-estimate the Germans when they are on their field.
At times even when they're on ours!
Would you believe me if I told you that the population here has almost doubled?
Twice as many assholes... Sounds impossible!
